entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
